long_description:
# Areas' helper tools

A [Luanti](https://www.luanti.org/) mod which aims to improve user experience
with [Area Protection Mod](https://content.luanti.org/packages/ShadowNinja/areas/)
by adding tools for easier area manipulation.

Currently the only available tool is "Area select-n-protect tool". It can
set coordinates, claim areas, add sub-areas for other players and remove
player-owned areas nearby.

**Dependencies:** `areas`, either `default` or `mcl_core`.

**Supported games:** `mineclone2`, `mineclonia`, `minetest_game`.

## Crafting recipes

### Area select-n-protect tool:

|                        |                 |                          |
| :--------------------: | :-------------: | :----------------------: |
| \[`default:coal_lump`] | —               | —                        |
| —                      | \[`group:wood`] | \[`dye:orange`]          |
| —                      | —               | \[`default:steel_ingot`] |

|                         |                 |                          |
| :---------------------: | :-------------: | :----------------------: |
| \[`mcl_core:coal_lump`] | —               | —                        |
| —                       | \[`group:wood`] | \[`mcl_dye:orange`]      |
| —                       | —               | \[`mcl_core:iron_ingot`] |

## Licenses

GNU LGPL version 2.1 or later fource code, CC0 for media.
See `copyright.txt` and `LICENSE.txt`
for more information.
name: areas_helper_tools
short_description: Convenience tools for Areas protection mod
title: Areas' helper tools
